description:
Essential Job Functions

- Accountability for the technical management, supervision, and control of manufacturing processes
- Ensure production processes run reliably and efficiently and comply with quality control standards
- Plan and oversee production schedules
- Ensure production resource requirements are met
- Maintain labor/materials budget and meet established timelines
- Adhere to all health and safety standards
- Train, motivate, mentor, and manage staff
- Maintain departmental personnel records and reports on productivity, quality, and attendance.
- Develop and implement schedules and scheduling requirements to meet or exceed the production plan.
- Monitor departmental productivity to ensure that established quality and production levels are maintained or exceeded
- Perform other duties as assigned
responsibilities: Accountability for the technical management, supervision, and control of manufacturing processes, ensuring production processes run reliably and efficiently, planning and overseeing production schedules, maintaining labor/materials budget, adhering to health and safety standards, training and managing staff, and monitoring departmental productivity.

qualifications.required: Bachelor’s degrees is a plus or equivalent experience, Five or more years; managerial experience in a beverage or food production environment, Must have experience with GMP procedures, USDA/FDA compliance, and sanitation, Must be dependable, adaptable and detail oriented.
qualifications.preferred: Bilingual English/Spanish is a strong plus.
